plot: A little old lady comes across a tall young man. To deal with their disparity in height, she telephones the titular charity.
title: Les filles de l'égalité
plot_es: A little old lady comes across a tall young man. To deal with their disparity in height, she telephones the titular charity.
plot_en: A little old lady comes across a tall young man. To deal with their disparity in height, she telephones the titular charity.
